channel.title: Invoke-customs on ColorfulDark Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Invoke-customs on ColorfulDark Blog

item.title: Invoke-customs are only supported starting with android 0 --min-api 26
item.description: Android Studio升级到3.5，工程在编译时出现错误： Invoke-customs are only supported starting with android 0 --min-api 26 解决方案： android{ //... compileOptions { sourceCompatibility JavaVersion.VERSION_1_8 targetCompatibility JavaVersion.VERSION_1_8 } //... } JavaVersion请根据您开发环境中实际的版本设置。 参考链接： https://stackoverflow.com/questions/49891730/invoke-customs-are-only-supported-starting-with-android-0-min-api-26
